abstract: The electric car start-up says investors have committed $40 million to help the company out of its financial trouble.
snippet: The electric car start-up says investors have committed $40 million to help the company out of its financial trouble.
lead_paragraph: UPDATED 4:23 p.m.: Added news of ruling against Tesla in Tesla’s suit against Fisker Automotive, a competing electric car company.

headline.main: Tesla Promised Another $40 Million, Loses Lawsuit
